languages.text: "Да. Это была я. Не твой предательский родич Кунрад. И не культисты. А я". {n}Арджента говорит со странной смесью гордости и ужаса в голосе.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Да. Это была я. Не твой предательский родич Кунрад. И не пираты. А я". {n}Арджента говорит со странной смесью гордости и ужаса в голосе.{/n}
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Yes. It was me. Not your treacherous kin Voigtvir. Not the cultists. Me." {n}She speaks with a strange blend of pride and horror in her voice.{/n}

languages.text: 「そう、私。裏切り者のキンのボイトヴィルでもなく、魔女団でもない。私なのよ」 {n}彼女は誇りと恐怖が入り混じった奇妙な声色で話す。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Yes. It was me. Not your treacherous kin Voigtvir. Not the cultists. Me." {n}She speaks with a strange blend of pride and horror in her voice.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「そう、私。裏切り者のキンのボイトヴィルでもなく、魔女団でもない。私なのよ」 {n}彼女は誇りと恐怖が入り混じった奇妙な声色で話す。{/n}
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: “没错，是我杀了她。既不是你那狡诈的族人维特威尔，也不是那些异端分子，是我杀的。”{n}她的声音很古怪，既带着自豪之意，又夹杂着恐惧的阴影。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Yes. It was me. Not your treacherous kin Voigtvir. Not the cultists. Me." {n}She speaks with a strange blend of pride and horror in her voice.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “没错，是我杀了她。既不是你那狡诈的族人维特威尔，也不是那些海盗，是我杀的。”{n}她的声音很古怪，既带着自豪之意，又夹杂着恐惧的阴影。{/n}
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: «Sí. Fui yo. Ni su traicionero pariente Voigtvir. Ni los cultistas. Yo». {n}Habla con una extraña mezcla de orgullo y horror en su voz.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Yes. It was me. Not your treacherous kin Voigtvir. Not the cultists. Me." {n}She speaks with a strange blend of pride and horror in her voice.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Sí. Fui yo. Ni su traicionero pariente Voigtvir. Ni los piratas. Yo». {n}Habla con una extraña mezcla de orgullo y horror en su voz.{/n}
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Ja. Ich war es. Nicht Euer verräterischer Verwandter Voigtvir. Nicht die Kultisten. Ich." {n}Sie spricht mit einer merkwürdigen Mischung aus Stolz und Entsetzen in der Stimme.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Yes. It was me. Not your treacherous kin Voigtvir. Not the cultists. Me." {n}She speaks with a strange blend of pride and horror in her voice.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ja. Ich war es. Nicht Euer verräterischer Verwandter Voigtvir. Nicht die Piraten. Ich." {n}Sie spricht mit einer merkwürdigen Mischung aus Stolz und Entsetzen in der Stimme.{/n}
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « Oui. C'était moi. Et non Voigtvir, aussi félon soit-il. Ni même les cultistes. C'était moi, » {n}répète-t-elle, la voix mêlée d'autant de fierté que d'horreur.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Yes. It was me. Not your treacherous kin Voigtvir. Not the cultists. Me." {n}She speaks with a strange blend of pride and horror in her voice.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Oui. C'était moi. Et pas Voigtvir, aussi traître soit-il. Ni même les pirates. Moi, » {n}répète-t-elle, la voix mêlée d'autant de fierté que d'horreur.{/n}
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Evet, katil benim. Hain hısmın Voigtvir değil. Tarikatçılar da değil. Ben." {n}Gurur ve dehşetin karışımından oluşan tuhaf bir ses tonuyla konuşuyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Yes. It was me. Not your treacherous kin Voigtvir. Not the cultists. Me." {n}She speaks with a strange blend of pride and horror in her voice.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Evet, katil bendim. Hain hısmınız Voigtvir değil. Tarikatçılar da değil. Ben." {n}Gurur ve dehşetin karışımından oluşan tuhaf bir ses tonuyla konuşuyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion
